enchant.desc.expanded: Insert into Ender Chest Book Slot to:
enchantability:air_walker.enchant.desc: Walk on air. Sprint jump to get off.
Protect area from explosions which affected you.
enchantability:dexterity.enchant.desc: Have a chance for increased crafting output.
enchantability:fast_break.enchant.desc: Fast Break: Break faster with hands.
enchantability:fire_praise.enchant.desc: Fire Praise: Get stronger when watching sun, but weaker at night.
enchantability:heat.enchant.desc: Increased speed of tiles nearby the player.
enchantability:smite.enchant.desc: Strike Lightning at foes with your sword or axe.
enchantability:void.enchant.desc: Teleport back from the end void.
enchantability:gluttony.enchant.desc: Have special effects when eating foods.
wither_heart.tooltip.only_worthy: Only the worthy will be rewarded!
wither_heart.tooltip.no_owner: Anyone is worthy of this heart.
wither_heart.already_eaten: You have already eaten a Wither Heart
